message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique product. I think you'll really like it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're interested in the product, but $8000 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $10500. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you try to get closer to $9000?

I can see you're really interested in the product, and I appreciate your honesty about your budget. I'm willing to make one more concession to $10000, but that's as low as I can go. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $9000 and $10000, so I'll offer $9500. Can you consider that?

I appreciate your creative approach to finding a middle ground, but I'm not willing to go below $10500. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $10000 and $10500, so I'll offer $10250. What do you think?
I understand your compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $9500 and $10250, so I'll offer $9875. Can you consider that?

I appreciate your persistence, but I'm starting to think we're getting close to the minimum I'm willing to accept. I'll meet you halfway between $10000 and $9875, so I'll offer $9937.50. This is my final offer, so I hope you can meet me there.

I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $9500 and $9937.50, so I'll offer $9718.75. This is my final offer, so I hope you can meet me there.
